briefTitle: KRX-0502 (Ferric Citrate) for the Treatment of IDA in Adult Subjects With NDD-CKD
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Study of KRX-0502 (Ferric Citrate) for the Treatment of Iron Deficiency Anemia (IDA) in Adult Subjects With Non-Dialysis Dependent (NDD) Chronic Kidney Disease
summary: a 24-week phase 3, multi-center clinical trial, comprised of a 16-week, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled period ("Randomized Period"), followed by an 8-week open-label safety extension period, where all subjects receive KRX-0502 (ferric citrate) ("Extension Period").

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects Achieving an Increase in Hemoglobin of â‰¥1.0 g/dL at Any Time Point Between Baseline and the End of the 16-week Randomized Period
